short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension hide all usernames from Reddit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension hides all reddit usernames, and even the user who is logged in. Soon it will have updates to make it work better on old reddit.

Repository: https://github.com/leanczo/reddit-anon-ce
